snippet.title: Hadr : Trailer
snippet.description:
A short trailer for upcoming game Hadr.

Wishlist it on steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1359760/HADR/
or on Itch.io https://domkonecny.itch.io/hadr

and follow news on Twitter https://twitter.com/DomKonecny
and Instagram https://www.instagram.com/hadr_game/

Hadr is a short experimental atmospheric game created by Dominik Konečný.
http://hadrgame.com/
